description:
It's called Mega Bites, but this pack has nothing to do with computers.
This is something way more intense! We are talking about two Hot Wheels™ Originals famous for their contagious “smile”. The first is Hotweiler™, an untameable purebred with ruthless strength: when it aims for the finish line, not even its chain can stop it! With such a pedigree, victory is always within reach. And then the legendary Shark Bite™, the shark that will give you a sea of satisfaction. When the opponents see its fin in the mirrors for them it’s already too late: Shark Bite™ will devour them in one bite.
Add them to your collection now. Missing Mega Bites Free Pack would be a big mistake!

This DLC includes:
- Hotweiler™
- Shark Bite™
name: HOT WHEELS UNLEASHED™ 2 - Mega Bites Free Pack
